pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ternary Plots for Trinomial Regression Models // An implementation of the ternary plot for interpreting regression coefficients of trinomial regression models, as proposed in Santi, Dickson and Espa (2018) doi:10.1080/00031305.2018.1442368. Ternary plots are drawn using either 'ggtern' package (based on 'ggplot2') or 'Ternary' package (based on standard graphics).
